function_declarations.name: send_to_benson
function_declarations.description: Transmits a signed ChainBridge PAC artifact to the Sovereign Relay. This function sends Policy Artifact Containers (PACs) to the ChainBridge execution engine for processing. PACs must include a pac_id for tracking, content containing the full PAC payload, and optionally an Ed25519 signature for identity verification (required for CONSTITUTIONAL_LAW tier).

pac_id.description: Unique identifier for the PAC (e.g., PAC-OCC-P26-FULL-IGNITION)

content.description: The full PAC payload containing all 23 blocks (METADATA through BER_HANDSHAKE)

signature_hex.description: Ed25519 signature of the content in hexadecimal format. Required for CONSTITUTIONAL_LAW tier PACs.

function_declarations.name: query_bridge_health
function_declarations.description: Checks the health status of the ChainBridge Sovereign Relay. Returns version, sovereignty status, and gate configuration.

function_declarations.name: list_active_pacs
function_declarations.description: Lists all active PACs currently loaded in the ChainBridge ledger.

filter_tier.description: Optional filter by governance tier (OPERATIONAL, STRATEGIC, CONSTITUTIONAL_LAW)
